spyr:beep_boop.NAME: Beep Boop
spyr:beep_boop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Focus affects Beep Boop !M! times.
spyr:beep_boop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Focus affects Beep Boop !M! times.

spyr:masochism.NAME: Masochism
spyr:masochism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! more damage each time you lose HP in combat.
spyr:masochism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! more damage each time you lose HP in combat.

spyr:revenge.NAME: Revenge
spyr:revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your missing HP.

spyr:staunch_bleeding.NAME: Staunch Bleeding
spyr:staunch_bleeding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, NL gain 1 Regen.
